item.title: What I Have Learned Today
item.description: Today, I have learned that the ‘Carbon’ Daemon of graphite is not able to handle encryption for incoming data.

item.title: MySQL to Postgresql
item.description: I dislike MySQL. I never did like it, since Oracle bought Sun it starting to become more then just disliking it. I prefer to work with Postgresql. I want to migrate some of my MySQL DB to Postgresql.

item.title: Bulding a virtualenv
item.description: virutalenv Virutalenv is a python program that allows you to create system separate container with an own version of python/pip.

item.title: Enable remote access for PostgreSQL
item.description: Remote access to a Postgtres Database In the last days i have worked a lot with PostgreSQL.

item.title: Howto fix libgeos_c.so not found
item.description: I'm working with Python Django and PostGIS. When i try to add the Geo support to the Project, i hit this error message: OSError: /usr/local/lib/libgeos_c.

item.title: svn2git
item.description: I'm currently moving our old svn repositories to git. There a lots of reason to do this.

item.description: I need some Monitoring for Nagios3 of my MongoDB.
